casebody.data:
E. L. EASON, Jr., appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, appellee. No. 11648. United States Court of Appeals Ninth Circuit. April 25, 1949. Leo R. Friedman and Jos. I. McMullen, both of San Francisco, Cal., for appellants. James M. Carter, U. S. Atty., and Clyde C. Downing and Bernard B. Laven, Asst U. S. Attys., all of Los Angeles, Cal., for appellee.

Before DENMAN, Chief Judge, and STEPHENS and ORR, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment is affirmed. Sampson Motors v. United States, 9 Cir., 168 F.2d 878.
